## Introduction

This document demonstrates caching in R Markdown with random number generation.

## Cached Random Numbers

```{r cache_random, cache=TRUE}
set.seed(123)  # Ensures reproducibility initially
random_numbers <- rnorm(100)  # Generate 100 random values
head(random_numbers)  # Display first few numbers
```
